tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE bioenergy_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE CostData (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    labor_costs DECIMAL,
    material_costs DECIMAL,
    overhead_costs DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE RevenueProjections (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    projected_revenue DECIMAL,
    sales_forecast DECIMAL,
    profit_margin DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE InvestmentReturns (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    initial_investment DECIMAL,
    annual_returns DECIMAL,
    payback_period DECIMAL
);
